parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.52</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Turrets </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns all magazines (including empty) from all vehicle turrets (including driver turret [-1]) and their ammo counts.   </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''magazinesAllTurrets''' vehicle</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - vehicle with turrets </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - in the following format: [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[className, turretPath, ammoCount, id, creator],...]  where:
* className: [[String]] - magazine class name
* turretPath: [[Array]] - turret path
* ammoCount: [[Number]] - how many rounds left in the magazine
* id: [[Number]] - id of the magazine object. The number starts at 10,000,000. This gives it about 7,600,000 possible ids before the number starts losing precision and cannot be used in scripts.
* creator: [[Number]] - [[owner]] / [[clientOwner]] of the PC that created the object
</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_mags = [[magazinesAllTurrets]] [[vehicle]] [[player]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[magazinesTurret]], [[allTurrets]], [[addMagazineTurret]], [[removeMagazinesTurret]], [[removeMagazineTurret]], [[weaponsTurret]], [[loadMagazine]], [[magazines]], [[magazinesDetail]], [[magazinesAmmo]], [[magazinesAmmoFull]], [[addWeaponTurret]], [[removeWeaponTurret]], [[turretLocal]], [[getPylonMagazines]], [[ammoOnPylon]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
